favoritesInfo: Click on the star in the top right corner of an application box to mark/unmark it as a favorite.
errorNoAppsDescription: No applications available to display. Please contact your system administrator.
infoNoFavoriteAppsDescription: No favorite applications selected. You must select some favorite applications before choosing to display only favorites.
infoCustomLaunchAction: Clicking an application tile can also perform a custom action, instead of launching a URL.
